goal.ch: 訓練研究生學術研究, 閱讀論文, 以及學術寫作的能力.
goal.en: To train graduate students to do research, to read papers, and to prepare for academic writing

outline.ch:
(1) 群試迴歸之實驗設計問題研究
(2) 維度縮減法之有效維度檢定問題研究
outline.en:
(1) Design problems for group testing regression
(2) Dimension tests for dimension reduction methods

textbook.ch:
(1) Vansteelandt, S., Goetghebeur, E., and Verstraeten, T. (2000). Regression models for disease prevalence with diagnostic tests on pools of serum samples. Biometrics, 56, 1126--1133. 
(2) Huang, S.-H., Shedden, K., and Chang H. (2023). Inference for the dimension of a regression relationship using pseudo-covariates. Biometrics, 79, 2394--2403. 
(3) The refences in the previous papers.
textbook.en:
(1) Vansteelandt, S., Goetghebeur, E., and Verstraeten, T. (2000). Regression models for disease prevalence with diagnostic tests on pools of serum samples. Biometrics, 56, 1126--1133. 
(2) Huang, S.-H., Shedden, K., and Chang H. (2023). Inference for the dimension of a regression relationship using pseudo-covariates. Biometrics, 79, 2394--2403. 
(3) The refences in the previous papers.

ch: 系所:限數學系碩士班、數學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc in Mathematics、PhD in Mathematics only.
